授業目的: The purpose of this class is to study different cultures and their histories in America from the point of view of gender and race relations. The approach will be historical, social, and political. The class will be conducted in a lecture format, with discussions and presentations. Therefore, students will be expected to make positive contributions to the class. The goal is to gain some knowledge of a variety of voices in the US.
到達目標: To understand U.S. society from a diasporic perspective.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回:
Week 1: Introduction and guidance.
Face to face format for All 14 lectures.
第2回: Week 2: An overview of American history.
第3回: Week 3: A history of the civil rights movement.
第4回: Week 4: Learning from historical figures I.
第5回: Week 5: Learning from historical figures II.
第6回: Week 6: Learning from historical figures III.
